DOC.detailed_description: PROTOCOL OUTLINE : Patients treat subcutaneous injection octreotide twice day . The dose adjust base response . If requirement transfusion intravenous iron 4 week hemoglobin great 10 mg/dL , therapy continue 1 year . If decrease bleed 10 week , patient remove study .
